page.title: 02FARM LABOUR
page.content: We have been looking at 2 farms in our area,and we have been comparing them {THE LABOUR FORCE. The Labour Force of the Dunhampton farm has been cut from 40 to 15 over 15 years because of mechanization. Their number of casual workers may vary over the course of the year. On the Great Horton Farm,the farm labour force has been cut from 15 to 2 because of mechanization.The workers from the Dunhampton Farm live in cottages owned by the company,they start work at 7.30 am and finish at 5.00pm and stay behind if work is not done.The 2 workers from the Great Horton Farm live in their own houses, they start work at 6.30 am to milk cows and finish work at 5.00pm,but somtimes they stay if the work is incomplete.
